name: BlastoBlitz
description:
BLASTOBLITZ is a top-down arcade shooter in which your attacks are also your main mode of transport. Collect blood from enemies to open portals and destroy the immune crystals!

Log in with a Newgrounds account to compete on the global  highscore leaderboard.

Features:
  • 4 Diverse environments
  • Many unique gameplay modifiers
  • An unlockable encyclopedia containing a multitude of enemies and weapons
  • Endlessly looping gameplay
  • An original soundtrack
  • High quality pixel art graphics
Controls:
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left click: shoot
